alert.note: Alert for Clearfield; Huntingdon; Mifflin; Northern Centre; Southern Centre (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 08 at 11:32AM EST until January 09 at 1:00PM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 1 PM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...A 1 to 2 hour period of wet snow expected during the mid or late morning, changing over to sleet and freezing rain by noon, then all rain in the afternoon. Total snow and sleet accumulations of 1 to 3 inches, with a light glazing of ice possible. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Clearfield, Northern Centre, Southern Centre, Huntingdon and Mifflin Counties. * WHEN...From 7 AM to 1 PM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The main period of snow and sleet will occur during or shortly after the primary morning commute hours to work and school.
info.instruction: The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania Turnpike Commission remind motorists to adjust speeds based on driving conditions as winter weather impacts will include snow covered roads and limited visibility. Call 5 1 1 or visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadway and traffic conditions. To report snow or ice, post to the NWS State College Facebook page, use Twitter @NWSStateCollege, or visit weather.gov/ctp.

area.areaDesc: Clearfield; Huntingdon; Mifflin; Northern Centre; Southern Centre
